rules_text:
{T}: Untap target land.
Whenever a permanent you control transforms into a legendary land, transform Koro, Passionate Gardener.
rules_text2: {T}: Untap target land. You may have it become a 6/3 Elemental land creature with haste and trample. If you do, sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step unless it's a legendary Demiplane.
